template.template: Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0
template.name: Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0
template.description:
## 20240910 过滤了空内存槽位 ## 20240529 修改为M7系列OID，修改了排列顺序，关闭了不需要的选项
## Description
加密方式改为SHA和AES
## Overview
支持 zabbix 5.0
通过SNMP监控浪潮BMC接口，兼容M4和M5系列，已经在NF5280M4、NF5280M5、SA5212M5等设备上测试。监控整体健康、型号、序列号等信息。同时可以自动发现内存、风扇、硬盘、温度数据。
support zabbix 5.0
Monitor the Inspur BMC interface through SNMPv3
It is compatible with M4 and M5 series. It has been tested on NF5280M4, NF5280M5, SA5212M5 and other devices. Monitor overall health, model, serial number and more. At the same time, you can automatically find the memory, fan, hard disk, and temperature data.
## Author
Yihai Duan

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.disk.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.disk.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_DISK_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.fan.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.fan.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_FAN_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.management.subsystem.health.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.management.subsystem.health.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_MANAGEMENT_SUBSYSTEM_HEALTH_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.memory.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.memory.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_MEMORY_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.microcontroller.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.microcontroller.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_MICROCONTROLLER_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.pcie.present.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.pcie.present.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_PCIE_PRESENT_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.power.supply.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.power.supply.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_POWER_SUPPLY_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.processor.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.processor.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_PROCESSOR_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.temperature.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.temperature.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_TEMPERATURE_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.voltage.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.voltage.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_VOLTAGE_STATUS_ALARM

trigger_prototype.expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.watchdog.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])>1
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: last(/Templates Server Inspur BMC All Items 4 Zabbix5.0/inspur.server.watchdog.status.[{#SNMPVALUE}])=1
trigger_prototype.name: INSPUR_SERVER_WATCHDOG_STATUS_ALARM
